cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.2)
project (warhol)
add_executable(warhol warhol.cpp)
# target_compile_features(warhol PRIVATE cxx_generalized_initializers)

find_package(OpenGL REQUIRED)
find_package(GLEW REQUIRED)
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-std=c++1y ${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -g")

#
# Very likely you will need to adjust the following paths to match your installation.
#

set(GLM_INCLUDE_DIR       "/opt/local/include" CACHE PATH "" FORCE)
set(GLFW_LIBRARIES        "/usr/lib/libglfw.so" CACHE FILEPATH "" FORCE)
set(GLFW_INCLUDE_DIR      "/opt/local/include" CACHE PATH "" FORCE)
set(FREEIMAGE_INCLUDE_DIR "/opt/local/include" CACHE PATH "" FORCE)
set(FREEIMAGE_LIBRARIES   "/usr/lib/libfreeimage.so" CACHE FILEPATH "" FORCE)

include_directories(${GLFW_INCLUDE_DIR})
include_directories(${GLEW_INCLUDE_DIRS})
include_directories(${GLM_INCLUDE_DIR})
include_directories(${OPENGL_INCLUDE_DIR})
include_directories(${FREEIMAGE_INCLUDE_DIR})
target_link_libraries(warhol ${OPENGL_LIBRARIES})
target_link_libraries(warhol ${GLFW_LIBRARIES})
target_link_libraries(warhol ${GLEW_LIBRARIES})
target_link_libraries(warhol ${FREEIMAGE_LIBRARIES})
